events.title: AI Hackathon 2025
events.description: Join our 48-hour AI innovation challenge where developers compete to create cutting-edge AI solutions. Work with the latest AI technologies, collaborate with experts, and win amazing prizes!
events.rules:
1. Teams of 1-4 people
2. Original work only
3. Must use provided APIs
4. Submit before deadline

events.title: Machine Learning Challenge
events.description: A two-month machine learning competition focused on solving real-world healthcare problems using AI. Participants will work with anonymized medical data to develop predictive models.
events.rules:
1. Individual participation only
2. Must follow data privacy guidelines
3. Weekly submissions required
4. Code must be well documented
